stories.text:
There is a lot of material around about applying for IC roles at FAANG, including materials like this Google video. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BYUy1yvjHxE

There seems to be a big focus on preparing via Leetcode etc. I've got 20+ years in IC and EM roles and are currently an EM, and thinking about a (specific) EM role at a FAANG. Any thoughts on if I need to think about LC or just apply as any other company?
stories.title: Ask HN: Applying for EM Roles at FAANG?
Why Brahmins lead Western firms but rarely Indian ones

stories.text: So every now and then I contemplate on quitting social media apps like Instagram and others because of time I spend on them. But I get this thought that am I weak (mind) in way that I am unable to control myself to spend moderate time on these things instead I am accepting defeat and quitting the platform all together . Does anyone feel like this or people who quit did you do that because you were unable to stop yourself ?
stories.title: Ask HN: Is quitting social media (Instagram, snap) sign of weakness?
Python module for parsing Apple Numbers .numbers files
